meanings.definition: A student pursuing a bachelor's degree at a college or university.
meanings.sent1: Many undergrads attend lectures to learn new things.
meanings.sent2: The campus was bustling with undergrads heading to their classes.
meanings.sent3: The group of undergrads tried to fit all their textbooks into tiny backpacks.
meanings.sent4: The undergrads were like eager sponges soaking up knowledge in every class.
meanings.sent5: Undergrads are the future leaders and innovators of tomorrow.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'undergrad', referring to students in their first four years of college.
meanings.sent1: The dormitory housed many undergrads from different majors.
meanings.sent2: During orientation week, the undergrads explored the campus together.
meanings.sent3: The undergrads formed a study group to tackle their challenging assignments.
meanings.sent4: The undergrads' enthusiasm for learning was contagious among their peers.
meanings.sent5: Undergrads eagerly embrace the opportunities that college offers.
